definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be low, depressed, grow poor (NH id., Niph.; Aram. [[מוּךְ]], sink or bend down; cf. [[מָכַח]], Syr. mak, mkek, be brought low, humble);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. consec. [[וּמָח]] Le 27:8 (P); Impf. [[יָמוּח]] Le 25:25, Le 25:35, Le 25:39 (all H); Pt. [[מָח]] Le 25:47 (P): all of impoverished Israelites.
